Name: Finding 21
About the game: Finding 21 is a puzzle game that explores the possibility of adding screen lock in a maze game. Gather all the flags in 40+ puzzles! Screen lock If you press the space bar, the screen won't move with the character. Keys and Grey area When you acquire a key, you gain the ability to erase walls of the same color as the key. When you enter the gray area, the screen fixation function becomes unavailable.
Meta Title: Finding 21: May 18, 2021, Blue Teddy Bear and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Finding 21? Check out the release date (May 18, 2021), developer insights from Blue Teddy Bear, and a complete game summary.
